review_blob: One of the best beers that youll find widely available, both at liquor stores and restaurants/bars.  Its my go-to beer when nothing else available sounds interesting.

While this beer may not stand up compared to quality beers, compared to other beers in its price category, its great.  I typically pay $5 or $6 for a 12 pack.  It also comes in the most unique can Ive ever seen.  Not willing to risk a whole $5 or $6 to sample it?  Then pay $2.50, pick up a 6 pack, invite some friends over and try it out.
